Name: Flameblade Pyromancer
Story Background: Born amidst the volcanic eruptions of the Firepeaks, the Flameblade Pyromancers harness the fiery energies of their homeland to incinerate their enemies.
Ability: When Flameblade Pyromancer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Appearance Description: Clad in flame-stitched robes and wielding blazing staves, the Flameblade Pyromancer's eyes glow with the intensity of a raging inferno.
